text: There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.
author: Maya Angelou

text: There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside her.
author: Maya Angelou

text: There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside me.
author: Maya Angelou

text: There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside us.
